title: Episode 12 - Building the Next Generation of Startups
description: Following a screening of the movie "Generation Startup," we chatted with three entrepreneurs (two of whom are featured in the film) - Andrew Yang, Founder of Venture for America (now a 2020 Democratic presidential candidate), Labib Rahman, Product Manager at IPC Systems and Kate Catlin, Founder of Flock - about what it takes to build the next generation of startups.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
